Extension Features:

TBS Trader:
Automated TBS on Zerodha with hedges.

Intraday PNL Chart:
Provides a detailed intraday Profit and Loss (PNL) chart to track your trading performance in real-time.

Payoff Chart:
Visualizes the potential outcomes of your trades with a detailed payoff chart, helping you plan and strategize effectively.


How to use it.
1. Install the extension.
2. Go to positions tab of zerodha.
3. Incase the extension does not load, hard refresh the page.
